page.title: 09SHERE SCHOOL
page.content: 3 Buildings 1. Small stone built National school founded 1842,together with school masters house.(Ewhurst stone). The land was granted to the Rector by{Mary {Ann Catherine Bray and Edward Bray. (when land and buildings were no longer used for School purposes they would revert to{Bray}family) School contained a Gallery until 1910. 1898 School enlarged 14ft to south. 1977 School house last occupied by Teacher. 2. Girls School built c.1856 Building next to Telephone Exchange 1898 School extended to S.by 22ft. 1912 .. .. 21ft. 3. Boys School 1870 (East building) Additional land granted by{Reginald {Bray}to Rector. Built by John Stanton Browne of Albury Heath.
